transport.question: I have wheels and carry people, but I'm smaller than a bus. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Families often own me
⛽ I need gas to go!
🛣️ I'm driven on roads

transport.question: I travel on tracks, carry many people and stop at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🚏 You wait for me at a specific spot.
🚂 I'm made up of many connected cars.
⏱️ I follow a schedule.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly through the clouds.
💺 I have many seats inside.
🌎 You take me to visit other countries.

transport.question: I travel on water and can carry many cars and people across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I float on the water.
⚓ I often go to an island.
🚗 I can carry your car.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you have to pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I'm good exercise.
🔔 I sometimes have a bell.
⛰️ People enjoy riding me on trails.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and I rush to help people in need. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I make a loud noise.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🤕 You need me when you are hurt.

transport.question: I'm a very fast train that travels underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I often go under rivers.
🏙️ You find me in big cities.
🎫 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I carry goods all over the world, but I'm much bigger than a ferry. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I carry lots of boxes.
🚢 I'm really big.
🌎 You can find me crossing oceans.

transport.question: I have a propeller on top, and I can land almost anywhere. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
➕ I help people in emergencies.
⚕️ I am often used for medical transport.

transport.question: I'm a vehicle that goes to space, beyond the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I travel very, very fast.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts ride in me.
🪐 I explore other planets.

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to march. I often carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size.
🧺 I work with others to find food.
🐜 My name rhymes with 'pant'.

bug.question: I float in the air and have colorful wings. I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I drink nectar from flowers.
🌈 My wings have beautiful patterns.
🦋 I start as an egg, then a larva, then a pupa, then me!

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I can sting if I feel threatened. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I am known for making something sweet.
🐝 I make a buzzing sound.

bug.question: I hop around and have strong legs. I make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🦗 I am known for my jumping ability.
🌿 I like to live in fields.

bug.question: I am a small, round beetle with spots. Some say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am often red with black spots.
🐞 My name is often associated with a woman.
🍀 People think I bring good fortune.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing abdomen. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can produce my own light.
🌙 I'm most active at night.
💡 People like to catch me in jars.

bug.question: I build my home with silk. I can bite if disturbed. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I am an arachnid with eight legs, not an insect.
🕷️ I am known for catching prey in my creation.
🏠 I live in a web.

bug.question: I mimic a stick to blend in with my surroundings. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am long and slender.
🍃 I am often green or brown.
🌱 My disguise helps me avoid predators.

bug.question: I have large eyes and long legs and eat other insects. I fold my front legs as if praying. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I am named for a religious posture.
💚 I am often green and blend into foliage.
🦗 I am a skilled hunter.

bug.question: I am a noisy insect that spends years underground as a nymph before emerging to sing in the summer. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a loud, buzzing sound.
🌳 I live in trees.
🐛 I spend most of my life underground.
